content: I was looking at the May 2016 Connectathon proposals and I am wondering if there are synergies between CDS-Hooks track and CDS enablement track.
Yes, I believe we decided to merge them - I'll check...
At this point we may have one official track, but I think it will still be two different paths (i.e. two different specifications that cover different CDS-related use cases).
(We did that at the January connectathon, too: one track, with two separate parts to it.)
where did this one land? are these paths competing methodologies going forward?
We're planning CDS Hooks track for May, yes! The arrangement should be similar to January.
FWIW, I don't see them as competing methodologies, I see them as coming at the same problem from different ends.
